Since a match with an unknown person had cost him so much effort, Dollar didn’t seem to have what it took to become the Chosen.When the match had been going on for more than an hour, Han Sen shapeshifted into the bloody slayer, approached Lei Ban and beat him in a close combat, which Lei was not good at.The same day, all major media in the Alliance had covered the contest.
